questions.question: What river was the lifeline of the Egyptian civilization?
questions.explanation: The Nile River was the lifeline of the Egyptian civilization, providing water and fertile soil.

questions.question: What was the writing system used by ancient Egyptians?
questions.explanation: The ancient Egyptians used hieroglyphics as their writing system.

questions.question: What were the massive tombs built for Egyptian pharaohs called?
questions.explanation: The pyramids were massive tombs built for Egyptian pharaohs.

questions.question: Who was the sun god in ancient Egyptian religion?
questions.explanation: Ra was the sun god in ancient Egyptian religion.

questions.question: What material did Egyptians use to write on?
questions.explanation: The Egyptians used papyrus, made from the papyrus plant, to write on.

questions.question: Which pharaoh is known for building the Great Pyramid of Giza?
questions.explanation: Pharaoh Khufu is known for building the Great Pyramid of Giza.

questions.question: What was the purpose of mummification in ancient Egypt?
options: To preserve the body for the afterlife
questions.explanation: Mummification was done to preserve the body for the afterlife.

questions.question: What was the title of the ruler of ancient Egypt?
questions.explanation: The ruler of ancient Egypt was called a pharaoh.

questions.question: What was the Rosetta Stone used for?
questions.explanation: The Rosetta Stone was used to decipher hieroglyphics.

questions.question: Which god was associated with the afterlife in Egyptian mythology?
questions.explanation: Osiris was the god associated with the afterlife in Egyptian mythology.

questions.question: What was the capital of ancient Egypt during the Old Kingdom?
questions.explanation: Memphis was the capital of ancient Egypt during the Old Kingdom.

questions.question: What was the primary purpose of the pyramids?
questions.explanation: The primary purpose of the pyramids was to serve as tombs for pharaohs.

questions.question: What was the name of the Egyptian queen who ruled as a pharaoh?
questions.explanation: Hatshepsut was an Egyptian queen who ruled as a pharaoh.

questions.question: What was the Book of the Dead?
questions.explanation: The Book of the Dead was a guide for the afterlife.

questions.question: What was the primary building material used for constructing pyramids?
questions.explanation: Limestone was the primary building material used for constructing pyramids.

questions.question: What was the role of the vizier in ancient Egypt?
questions.explanation: The vizier was the chief advisor to the pharaoh.

questions.question: What was the significance of the Nile River's annual flooding?
options: It provided fertile soil for farming
questions.explanation: The Nile River's annual flooding provided fertile soil for farming.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian writing tool?
questions.explanation: The ancient Egyptians used a reed pen for writing.

questions.question: What was the purpose of the Sphinx in ancient Egypt?
questions.explanation: The Sphinx was built to guard the pyramids.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian sun disk god?
questions.explanation: Aten was the ancient Egyptian sun disk god.

questions.question: What was the primary occupation of most ancient Egyptians?
questions.explanation: Most ancient Egyptians were farmers.

questions.question: What was the name of the ceremonial crown worn by pharaohs?
questions.explanation: The Pschent was the ceremonial crown worn by pharaohs.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian goddess of love and beauty?
questions.explanation: Hathor was the ancient Egyptian goddess of love and beauty.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian god of mummification?
questions.explanation: Anubis was the ancient Egyptian god of mummification.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian goddess of magic and motherhood?
questions.explanation: Isis was the ancient Egyptian goddess of magic and motherhood.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian god of chaos?
questions.explanation: Set was the ancient Egyptian god of chaos.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian god of the sky?
questions.explanation: Horus was the ancient Egyptian god of the sky.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian goddess of truth and justice?
questions.explanation: Ma'at was the ancient Egyptian goddess of truth and justice.

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient Egyptian god of the underworld?
questions.explanation: Osiris was the ancient Egyptian god of the underworld.
